entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: The future of this species has been destroyed, there are no eggs left alive to breed more.
entries.journal_entry_description: Agent Taarna wants you to destroy all of the egg nurseries that were listed in the directory terminal you sliced when you entered the base.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: The directory terminal listed four nurseries in the lab. They are classified by the first four letters of the Aurebesh; Aurek, Besh, Cresh, and Dorn. All four of these must be destroyed.
entries.task01_message_box_text: The directory terminal listed four nurseries in the lab. They are classified by the first four letters of the Aurebesh; Aurek, Besh, Cresh, and Dorn. All four of these must be destroyed.
entries.task02_comm_message_text: Good! The nurseries have to be destroyed. The best way would be to infect some of the eggs with that intron virus mentioned in the dead scientist's datapad. See if you can find any.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: The nurseries are in this lab as well. You have contacted agent Taarna and let him know as well. He seems to think the only sure way to destroy all of the creatures is to infect their nurseries with the intron virus mentioned in the datapad you found while trying to save the crashed crew. See if you can find more information about the virus here in the lab.
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Contact Agent Taarna With Nursery Information
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: You need to find some of the self-destruct virus the creature's creators made in case of an emergency.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: The biochemist's notes indicated that the self-destruct intron virus was being stored in a supply cabinet somewhere in the lab. This virus must be found before you can destroy the nurseries.
entries.task04_journal_entry_title: Find the Supply Cabinet with the Intron Virus
entries.task05_comm_message_text: Ok, now that you have the virus apply it to the mature eggs in the nurseries. The virus will then get transmitted to all the other eggs. We'll let the Genetech Syndicate's own emergency plan clear these things up for us.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Let agent Taarna know that you have found the intron virus.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Find and infect all of the egg clusters in this nursery with the self-destruct virus.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Find and infect all of the egg clusters in this nursery with the self-destruct virus.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Find and infect all of the egg clusters in this nursery with the self-destruct virus.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Find and infect all of the egg clusters in this nursery with the self-destruct virus.
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: There are four nurseries in the GeneTech Syndicate lab. You must destroy all four. Use the serum on a few of the eggs in each area.
